channel.title: emscripten on Technical Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in emscripten on Technical Ramblings

item.title: Evaluate python code using client side javascript
item.description: Now Python code can be evaluated using Client side Javascript with the help of empythoned project. empythoned uses emscripten which convert LLVM bitcode to javascript. What is empythoned? Empythoned is project which has converted CPython to javascript. I have created a demo project to test how to use empythoned, have a look.
